## INodePackageJson.dependenciesMeta property

An array of metadata for dependencies declared inside dependencies, optionalDependencies, and devDependencies. https://pnpm.io/package\_json\#dependenciesmeta

**Signature:**

```typescript
dependenciesMeta?: IDependenciesMetaTable;
```
